704617f-a.title: Brooklyn: Burnett Street - Avenue U
704617f-a.text:
(1)  Gerritsen Creek, south of Ave. U, and east of Burnett Street,
showing the Gerritsen grist mill, and also showing a view to the south
west.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
The same, showing a close-up of the mill and the spillway.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUDED.
(3)
The same, another view.
August 1923.
Eugene L Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REE:ODUCED.
(4)
The same, showing at the right, a section of the mansion. I1
the foreground is a section of Marsh Street. This view will event-
ually be land, and will be enclosed in Marine Park.
September 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAd BE REPRODUCED.
704617f-a.folder: Burnett Street & Avenue U, Brooklyn, NY
